name: Rally Runner
description:
The only endless runner that brings rally racing, real physics, and full car damage to your fingertips.

No on-rails, no tap-to-shift driving here. You have full control!

- Drive awesome FWD, RWD, AWD and OPEN Class Cars!

- Experience a different, randomly generated race with each run!

- Manage a pit crew that makes car repairs as you progress through the stages!

- Collect 100s of car skins to personalize your ride!

- Conquer the leaderboards and Send challenges to friends to see who is the king of rally!

- Track your stats as you level up and unlock achievements!

Race for as long and as fast as you can to earn points to upgrade your car. Just try not to crash out!

"Just one more run!!!1!1"
